title: Coinbase Attempts to Plug Void in Crypto Perpetuals Left by FTX
description: Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase this week announced that it had received regulatory approval to list perpetual futures on its international exchange.

title: Disney Speedstorm Goes Free-to-Play, Launches Aladdin-inspired Season
description: In an exciting turn of events, Gameloft has officially transitioned Disney Speedstorm from its “early access” phase to a free-to-play racing extravaganza. Available on the Nintendo Switch and various other platforms, this move is set to delight Disney fans and gamers alike. Alongside this significant update, Speedstorm is rolling out its fourth season, paying homage ... Read more

title: How Hong Kong became the new hub for cryptocurrencies
description: In just a year, Hong Kong has moved from being a cryptocurrency-unfriendly region to claiming the top spot among the most cryptocurrency-ready countries and territories. What is the reason for such dramatic changes?

title: BREAKING: SEC Approves Game-Changer – Valkyrie’s ETF Merges Bitcoin and Ethereum Futures to Conquer Trillion-Dollar Market
description: Valkyrie transitions its Bitcoin Strategy ETF to encompass Ethereum futures, marking an innovative move. With the SEC’s approval, Valkyrie paves the way, hinting at a transformative evolution in the cryptocurrency investment arena. Drawing from a fresh Coindesk update and amplified by fervent tweets, the investment domain is on the verge of a notable paradigm shift. [...]

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad Author Warns of Fed CBDC, Asks to Take Measures
description:
Robert Kiyosaki, author of “Rich Dad, Poor Dad,” warns about the development of a US central bank digital currency (CBDC) by the Federal Reserve. Kiyosaki advocates for alternative assets such as precious metals, bitcoin, and physical banknotes. .He encourages people to save these assets for anonymity and to avoid government monitoring. Robert Kiyosaki issued a […]
